title: @meddler can you discus with us what was the obstacle that made Darius rework on "hold" ? please
body:
I really HATE how Darius as been left and I think he should get his rework asap because he is the only champ that didn't only get nerfed with numbers but got his own identity changed, he just feels awful to play for so long now...worst than urgot..

Can we get an updates on whats coming for him or just talk about him so I know something will be done someday?



Edit: Darius does not have mobility or innate tankyness as a trade off for his full reset ultimate but now he doesn't have it anymore so I think a rework would be awesome

replies.body:
Fair question, we've been silent about Darius for too long. Someday we'd like to work on Darius a bit, give him a longer combat pattern (bleed stacks higher, bigger eventual reward for 10 stacks, not as easy to get to max stacks quickly etc). 

That's not one of the projects we're currently working on though (not lack of desire, but other things we feel are higher value). What we are going to try in the short term as a result, potentially in the next couple of patches, are some experimental changes to his ult at higher ranks. We removed the full reset because of how heavily it shut opponents out of lane if they died to it once. That change was needed, but came at a cost to Darius' post laning play that we think might have been unnecessary. We're going to test out ways of giving Darius more access to his ult mid to late game as a result, with potential options at higher ranks including lower mana costs, lower CD, longer recast window, possibly (note: this one's pretty experimental) a full reset at max rank etc.

Personally, I think one of the biggest problems with Darius's pattern right now is that his ult doesn't do anything on assists. On the one hand I can see it, but on the other? Darius does the most damage he can if he's getting every kill in the fight, but there are plenty of reasons that you don't want him to be doing that. I wonder if they could make it more like Kat's current reset, even if they had to nerf the damage a bit to compensate.

My issue with Darius is that he feels like a super niche pick; He's a good pic against other champs who aren't all that good.

If anyone top lane has range, mobility, or sustain, they're going to beat Darius unless they are incredibly bad with their champ.

This means that Darius is good again.... Fiora? Because I can't think of any other champ I've used against Darius that made my laning phase difficult.
Sometimes I wonder if anyone at Riot actually even does anything.

I love when people complain about Darius being too strong or impossible to play against. Yeah, it's oppressive and obnoxious to deal with, but far from impossible. The most aggravating thing he has to offer is his easy waveclear, which is also his harass skill, which will demolish you if you let it. Trouble is, this is as much his weakness as his strength. Try aggressively harassing a smart enemy without pushing your lane as darius. As with most lane bullies, the counterplay is typically having a jungler. That, or playing around the overconfidence they are sure to act on based upon their character choice. I frequently stomp this guy with Garen, and I think Darius is a MUCH better bruiser overall than Garen. That is, he does way more for his team, having a pull and a slow, and not needing to itemize as much into damage or penetration.
